title: Sportscast - October 8, 2015
text:
Sports » CBS 2 Local Sports » Sportscast - October 8, 2015 CBS 2 Local Sports 
Updated: Thu, Oct 08 2015, 11:38 PM 
The full sportscast from the CBS 2 News at 10 on October 8, 2015. Related Stories Ed Thomas Coach of the Week Faith, Family, Football. Words of Inspiration from the Coach Ed Thomas Foundation. CBS 2 and FOX 28 in partnership with the Eastern Iowa Airport are looking for coaches who embody the spirit of Coach Thomas by having a strong impact on the community and on the sidelines. Nominate your favorite coach from any sport in the form below. Your Name: Tell us about your nomination: Please re-enter the code shown in the image below. AP News Wires Entertainment News 
JUDGE DENIES COSBY BID TO TOSS LAWSUIT 
SANTA MONICA, Calif. (AP) -- A lawsuit against Bill Cosby has survived an attempt to have it kicked out of court. Business News 
Investors await release minutes from Fed's policy meeting 
WASHINGTON (AP) -- While the minutes from the Federal Reserve's regular policy meetings can be a ho-hum affair, the mood is different this time. 
IN THE NEWS: SELF-DRIVING CARS 
TOKYO (AP) -- Like those objects in your rear-view mirror, self-driving cars may be closer than they appear.
